channel.title: Clis on EsilyZhang 的备忘单
channel.description: Recent content in Clis on EsilyZhang 的备忘单

item.title: adb (Android Debug Bridge)
item.description: Device Basics Command Description adb devices Lists connected devices adb devices -l Lists connected devices and kind — — adb root Restarts adbd with root permissions adb start-server Starts the adb server adb kill-server Kills the adb server adb remount Remounts file system with read/write access adb reboot Reboots the device adb reboot bootloader Reboots the device into fastboot adb disable-verity Reboots the device into fastboot wait-for-device can be specified after adb to ensure that the command will run once the device is connected.

item.title: Bash 命令行
item.description: if 语法 if test-command; then consequesnt-commands; [elif more-test-commands; then more-consequesnt;] [else alternate-consequesnt;] fi for 语法 # words 不指定，只执行一次 for name [in words ...]; do commands; done for (( expr1; expr2 )); do commands; done # 等价于 (( expr1 )) while (( expr2 ));do commands done words file1.txt file2.txt file3.txt # 或者 Apple Sony "Hewlett Packard" 通配符 * 表示的是文件夹中的文件名字 for thisfile in *; do echo "found $thisfile"; done 例子 1 - 10 for i in `seq 1 10` do echo "$i"; done # 大括号实现 for i in {1.
